abstract: Major League Baseball Commissioner Rob Manfred defends appointment of Fred Wilpon, majority owner of New York Mets, as chairmen of MLB's finance committee.
lead_paragraph: Though he was a victim of Bernard L. Madoff’s Ponzi scheme, the Mets’ majority owner, Fred Wilpon, was viewed as the right man for the job.
snippet: Though he was a victim of Bernard L. Madoff’s Ponzi scheme, the Mets’ majority owner, Fred Wilpon, was viewed as the right man for the job.

headline.main: M.L.B. Defends Fred Wilpon and His Financial Role
headline.print_headline: M.L.B. Defends Wilpon and His Financial Role
